title: Calligraphic fonts - recommendations
content:
Hi,

I was just wondering if anybody could recommend any excellent calligraphy style fonts at all?

Muchly appreciated,

Dave

 [‹ Paper for Bookbinding](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828110749/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43927 "Go to previous forum topic") [Is this price real? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828110749/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43998 "Go to next forum topic")
author: WhitePepper

comments.content:
See the work of

[Rob Leuschke](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828110749/http:/www.myfonts.com/browse/person/leuschke/rob/)  
 [Alejandro Paul](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828110749/http:/www.veer.com/search/results.aspx?savedSearch=19cb20ee8fc5d5ab)  
 [Ronna Penner](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828110749/http:/www.myfonts.com/browse/person/penner/ronna/)  
 [Hubert Jocham](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828110749/http:/www.hubertjocham.de/item.php/type/display/Mommie/).

For a start.
